rule.name: GLOBAL_UserProfile_Section
rule.description: SAIL that produces a view of a user profile information into a section.
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Design Engineer", firstColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField"( label: "Initiator:", instructions: "Click the profile picture to view the Initiator's profile.", helpTooltip: "Click the picture below to view the Initiator's profile.", images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: getprofilepictureforuser(touser(ri!username)), link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"( label: "Click here to view user profile.", user: ri!username, view: "summary" ) ), size: "SMALL" ) }, secondColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Name:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "firstName") & " " & user(ri!username, "lastName"), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Title:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "titleName"), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Office:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "phoneOffice"), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Mobile:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "phoneMobile"), readOnly: true() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Contact:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "email"), readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Location:", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: user(ri!username, "city") & ", " & user(ri!username, "state") & ", " &user(ri!username, "country") , readOnly: true() ) }, iscollapsible: true ),
